featured.text: To prevent the spread of the Ebola virus from West Africa to the rest of the world, many airports have begun Ebola ______ for passengers from the infected areas.

definition.zh_def: 埃博拉病毒病是一種由埃博拉病毒引起的嚴重傳染病，通常導致高死亡率。
definition.en_def: Ebola is a severe infectious disease caused by the Ebola virus, often resulting in high mortality rates.
definition.example: The outbreak of Ebola in West Africa raised global health concerns.
